SENT.plain: Symptomatic cardiac arrhythmias are a very disturbing sign to well-trained athletes, warranting prompt diagnosis and therapy, preferably not interfering with their physical performance at the time
A case is presented where exercise induced atrial flutter occurred in the aftermath of a viral infection
Basic tools like holter-monitoring and a heart-rate meter provided insight and understanding

Arrhythmia management really is a joint venture between athlete and physician to provide a tailor-made solution, using interventional techniques, cardiovascular conditioning and sometimes a pharmaceutical agent, all together carefully auto-monitored
